title: Schema for an Open Contracting Release under Procuriosity implementation

description.pcr: A globally unique identifier for this Contracting Process
description.general: A globally unique identifier for this Contracting Process

description.pcr: An identifier for this particular release of information

description.pcr: The date this information is released, it may well be the same as the parent publishedDate, it must not be later than the publishedDate from the parent package. It is used to determine merge order.
